Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Mudhalaam Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyil Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Vaasasthalaththai Sthaabanampannu.
3 adhile Saatchippettiyai Vaiththu, Pettiyaith Thiraiyinaal Maraiththu,
4 mejaiyaik Konduvandhu, Adhil Vaikkavendiyadhaik Kiramamaai Vaiththu, Kuththuvilakkaik Konduvandhu, Adhin Vilakkugalai Etri,
5 pon Thoobabeedaththaich Saatchippettikku Munne Vaiththu, Vaasasthalaththu Vaasalin Thongudhiraiyaith Thookkivaikkakkadavaai.
6 pinbu, Thaganabalibeedaththai Aasarippuk Koodaaramaagiya Vaasasthalaththin Vaasalukku Munbaaga Vaiththu,
7 thottiyai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkum Balibeedaththukkum Naduve Vaiththu, Adhile Thanneer Vaarththu,
8 sutrup Piraagaaraththai Niruththi, Piraagaaravaasal Thongudhiraiyaith Thookkivaiththu,

9 abishega Thailaththai Eduththu, Vaasasthalaththaiyum Adhilulla Yaavaiyum Abishegampanni, Adhaiyum Adhilulla Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga; Appozhudhu Parisuththamaayirukkum.
10 thaganabalibeedaththaiyum Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum Abishegampanni, Adhaip Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga; Appozhudhu Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaana Balibeedamaayirukkum.
11 thottiyaiyum Adhin Paadhaththaiyum Abishegampanni, Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga.
12 pinbu Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Varachcheydhu, Avargalai Jalaththinaal Snaanam Pannuviththu,
13 aaronukkup Parisuththa Vasthirangalai Uduththi, Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadikku Avanai Abishegampanni, Avanaip Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga.
14 avan Kumaararaiyum Varachcheydhu, Avargalukku Angigalai Uduththi,

15 avargal Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadi, Avargalaiyum, Avargal Thagappanai Abishegampanninabadiye, Abishegampannuvaayaaga; Avargal Perum Andha Abishegam Thalaimuraidhorum Niththiya Aasaariyaththuvaththukku Edhuvaayirukkum Endraar.
16 karththar Thanakkuk Karpiththapadiyellaam Mose Seydhaan.
17 irandaam Varusham Mudhalaam Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyil Vaasasthalam Sthaabanam Pannappattadhu.
18 mose Koodaaraththai Eduppiththaan; Avan Adhin Paadhangalai Vaiththu, Adhin Palagaigalai Niruththi, Adhin Thaazhppaalgalaip Paaichchi, Adhin Thoongalai Naatti,
19 vaasasthalaththinmel Koodaaraththai Viriththu, Adhinmel Koodaaraththin Moodiyai, Karththar Thanakkuk Karpiththabadiye Pottaan.
20 pinbu, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Saatchippiramaanaththai Eduththu, Adhaip Pettiyile Vaiththu, Pettiyil Thandugalaippaaichchi, Pettiyinmel Kirubaasana Moodiyai Vaiththu,
21 pettiyai Vaasasthalaththukkulle Kondupoi, Maraivin Thiraichcheelaiyaith Thongavaiththu, Saatchip Pettiyai Maraiththuvaiththaan.
22 pinbu, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Mejaiyai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Vaasasthalaththin Vadapuramaaith Thiraikkup Purambaaga Vaiththu,
23 adhinmel Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Appaththai Varisaiyaaga Adukkivaiththaan.
24 pinbu, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Kuththuvilakkai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Mejaikku Edhiraaga Vaasasthalaththin Thenpuraththile Vaiththu,
25 karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vilakkugalai Etrinaan.
26 pinbu, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Thiraikku Munbaagap Porbeedaththai Vaiththu,
27 adhinmel Sugandhavarkkaththinaal Thoobangaattinaan.
28 pinbu, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Vaasasthalaththin Thongudhiraiyaith Thookkivaiththu,
29 thaganabalibeedaththai Aasarippuk Koodaaramaana Vaasasthalaththin Vaasalukku Munbaaga Vaiththu, Adhinmel Sarvaanga Thaganabaliyaiyum Bojanabaliyaiyum Seluththinaan.
30 avan Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkum Balibeedaththukkum Naduve Thottiyai Vaiththu, Kazhuvugiradharku Adhile Thanneer Vaarththaan.
31 avvidaththile Moseyum Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalaiyum Kaalgalaiyum Kazhuvinaargal.
32 karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Avargal Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkulle Piravesikkirapodhum, Balibeedaththandaiyil Serugirapodhum, Avargal Kazhuvikkolluvaargal.
33 pinbu, Avan Vaasasthalaththaiyum Balibeedaththaiyum Sutrip Piraagaaraththai Niruththi, Piraagaaraththin Thongudhiraiyaith Thongavaiththaan; Ivvidhamaai Mose Velaiyai Mudiththaan.
34 appozhudhu Oru Megam Aasarippuk Koodaaraththai Moodinadhu; Karththarudaiya Magimai Vaasasthalaththai Nirappitru.
35 megam Adhinmel Thangi, Karththarudaiya Magimai Vaasasthalaththai Nirappinadhinaal, Mose Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkul Piravesikkak Koodaamal Irundhadhu.
36 vaasasthalaththilirundhu Megam Mele Ezhumbumbodhu, Isravel Puththirar Pirayaanam Pannap Purappaduvaargal.
37 megam Ezhumbaadhirundhaal, Adhu Ezhumbum Naalvaraikkum Pirayaanam Pannaadhiruppaargal.

38 isravel Vamsaththaar Pannum Ellaap Pirayaanangalilum Avargalellaarudaiya Kangalukkum Piraththiyatchamaagap Pagalil Karththarudaiya Megamum, Iravil Akkiniyum, Vaasasthalaththin Mel Thangiyirundhadhu.
